{{for|other uses in the {{XC|series}}|Blade|Weapons}} {{spoiler}} '''Blades''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|ブレイド}}) are weapons in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}.
== Overview == Blades are created by the soldiers of [[Keves]] and [[Agnus]] for their own use. They can take the form of swords, guns, shields, hammers, or any other form of weapon. Each [[Class (XC3)|class]] wields a unique kind of Blade.
The type of blades that soldiers of Keves and Agnus use stay consistent across their lifespans. Despite being unable to change them, significant alterations and upgrades can be made to Blades. Defeating enemies with a Blade is required to fill a [[Ferronis]] [[Flame Clock]], so soldiers who cannot are often considered dead weight by other soldiers. [[Ouroboros]] have the ability to use blades belonging to others.
On rare occasions, a soldier may lack the ability to summon a blade, as seen with [[Nikol]]. {{clr}}

[[file:Pest Control 1.png|thumb|A pair of Blants]] '''Blants''' are a family of enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}, first appearing in {{XC2}}. They resemble walking plants, with a large flower on their heads and [[wikipedia:Venus flytrap|Venus flytraps]] for arms. They are usually found near or in water. Blants come in pink and purple varieties, and in {{TTGC}}, one of the four [[Unique Monster (XC2)|Golden Monsters]] in the [[Kingdom of Torna]] is a Blant.
"Blants" do not exist as a species in game files - they are classified as [[Squood]] (and are therefore Aquatic type enemies).
